Sports city Bremerhaven

An incredible variety of sports facilities

Bremerhaven plays at a high national level in sports. But apart from the Bundesligavinen basketball 'Eisbären Bremerhaven' and the ice hockey team 'Fischtown Pinguins', Bremerhaven still has a lot more to offer in terms of sport.

Here you will find everything about sports grounds, sports halls, water and shooting sports and, of course, golf.
